description: June, July, Aug 2003-2016 Mean Chlorophyll a  shows he seasonal climatology /mean productivity over a fourteen year season /period. Longterm montly mean data (fro 203-2016 was retrieved from Environmental Research Division's Data Access Program website (ERDDAP) and binned by season to calculate Seasonal Mean/climatology.
name: June, July, Aug 2003-2016 Mean Chlorophyll a Concentration, mg m^-3
